title: 我装了光影后出现这个
author: whjie
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking memory connection

A full error report has been saved to F:\minecraft\1.5.2整合包\MCBBS服4周目客户端\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-21_11.06.19-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT cecc9232 --------
Full report at:
F:\minecraft\1.5.2整合包\MCBBS服4周目客户端\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-21_11.06.19-server.txt

replies.author: 天蓝色
replies.txt_content: 内存问题，调大最大内存

replies.author: xiaodian
replies.txt_content: 内存泄露 可以显卡卡提高

replies.author: dontcampy
replies.txt_content:
去F:\minecraft\1.5.2整合包\MCBBS服4周目客户端\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-21_11.06.19-server.txt
把这文件找出来在发，我很好奇楼上两位仁兄，明明错误报告啥也没写就能看出问题。
